backend/main.mo: Placeholder Motoko canister with no functional backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites, IC naming rules, and standard deployment steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
Node script that runs TypeScript checks and Vite build with colored diagnostic output.
frontend/scripts/retry-deploy.sh: Deployment retry script that validates names, cleans build/dfx state, and redeploys canisters with error guidance.
frontend/scripts/validate-deploy-names.m: Node script validating IC naming rules in dfx.json and canister_ids.json with detailed error messages.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring together search, cart state, product grid, UI sections, and theme provider.
UI component that displays an error message with optional primary and secondary action buttons.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches app errors and shows an ActionableError with a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out cart panel showing items, total price, removal controls, and WhatsApp checkout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, quick links, social icons, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, search input, and cart button showing item count.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, and a button that scrolls to the products list.
frontend/src/components/NoticeBar.tsx: Scrolling marquee displaying repeated service time information.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product display card with image, rating, pricing, quantity controls, and buy/add-to-cart actions.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Product listing grid that filters products by search query and renders ProductCard components.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsSection.t: A reviews component that displays customer reviews and allows users to submit new ones via a form with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/TrustSection.tsx: A simple section showing a safe checkout message and payment method icons.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: A floating WhatsApp contact button linking to a predefined phone number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hook that prepares for future backend queries using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH theme variables, dark mode definitions, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related scripts using ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin, path aliasing, dev server proxy, and manual chunking for optimized builds.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, storefront requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and required assets for the subscription store.
